title: Textile, 1830–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Length of printed cotton with half-drop repeat of flowers on a curved branch. Many colors on a tan background, in the style of the 18th century.

Textile, 1830–50.
1830–50. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Gift of Elinor Merrell. 1973-62-3.
